title: CHLOROQUINE LADY BOMBSHELL! What the Media IGNORED | Ep #3 Good Morning MugClub
description: Steven and the team drop some background info that the media missed on the “Chloroquine Lady," aka the lady who gave her husband fish-tank cleaner because President Trump "told her to.” Steven also talks about de Blasio’s attack on Christianity, talks to Dinesh D’Souza about identity socialism, and shares a spiritual experience he had this morning by nearly soiling himself.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
